content: Show off the twins while you chug your drink with these drink koozies that feature a set of double D’s. These busty drink koozies will insulate and keep your drink cold, and are available in a variety of styles from “Got MILF?” to “Motorboating”.

The technology to create portals may not exist yet, but in the mean time you can use your imagination to relive all those fun puzzles with these incredibly detailed replica portal guns. These 1:1 scale replica guns have blue and orange LEDs, and trigger firing sounds.

Now you can easily have a cup holder on your desk with these clip on desk cup holders. No longer must you place your drink on top of your desk, dirtying the glass, warping the wooden top, or risking knocking over and spilling your drink all over your keyboard and mouse.

Bring your garden up to speed with the modern world with these super bright light up planters. Each one of these planters has fifteen LEDs inside that combine for a powerful glowing light that easily make your garden area look sleek and modern.

Look suave and sophisticated without wearing an actual full suit jacket with these long sleeve suit shirts. The perfect combination of style and comfort, these suit shirts go great with some fitted pants. You’ll practically be beating women off with a stick.

Snuggle up and feel like a true wizard with these Harry Potter sleeved blankets. Even if you are only a muggle, these sleeved blankets will give you the look and feel of a Hogwarts apprentice, especially when combined with the magic wand TV remote control.

Assert yourself as the rightful king of the cubicle with these mini wooden ballistas. Each ballista comes ready to assemble from a laser cut wooden kit, and includes mini wood ammo pieces that are capable of being shot up to thirty feet!

Relax by the pool like never before with these giant bean bag pool floats. These enormous floating chairs are similar to the bean bags you had as a kid, but the inside is filled thousands of special buoyant beads and the exterior fabric is mold, stain, and sun damage resistant.

Use the force to bake some delicious munchies with these Star Wars cookie cutters. With a set of four classic Star Wars molds, your young Padawans will jump at the chance to bake and intricately style each and every geeky cookie that pops out of the oven.

Play “Draw Something” with your friends on a whole new level with the iCrayon stylus pen that will make you feel like you’ve entered the digital age of drawing and coloring. Available in multiple crayon colors, the iCrayon pen is the perfect gift for Draw Something fans.

The best sexual innuendo joke ever is now here to bring smiles to immature minds in shirt form. Everyone loves taking innocent comments and making them sound suggestive, and the That’s What She Said shirt will show everyone your commitment to keeping it up.

Why should only women get the large variety of scented candles? These masculine scented candles for men include testosterone boosting smells such as freshly cut grass, lumber, and a general fine musk that will add character to any man cave or bachelor pad.

Encase a real spider in a clear acrylic mouse and watch as your computer or laptop quickly becomes the least used PC at your home or office. Available in multiple arachnoid and insect styles, these real spider mouses are ideal for arachnoid lovers.

Get intimate with your partner like never before with the underwear designed for two people. It works perfectly for ensuring sexytime for the man, and snuggles afterwards for the woman, so it’s a win-win. This underwear is also great if you’re morbidly obese.
Carry around your cash like the bad ass you are with the Bad Mother Fucker wallet. This 100% Genuine Leather bi-fold wallet has Bad Mother Fucker embroidered on it.

Easily take your beer or liquor anywhere in this hidden bladder flask. Onlookers will think you are peeing into a cup and drinking from it, a la Bear Grylls, but you’ll have the last laugh as you sneak in that sweet nectar that’s warm from the heat given off from your crotch!

If owning a motorcycle isn’t making you feel like a badass already, the full body leather Captain America motorcycle suit will certainly do the trick. With painstaking detail, these suits are exact replicas from the uniform seen in the original Captain America movie.

For decades Zelda fans have been wondering what great powers would be unlocked when you located and combined all pieces of the Triforce – it turns out it was just a lamp all along. Perfect for gamers, the Triforce lamp can be configured as either a hanging or desk lamp.

Stop settling for poorly made drinks – now you can blend your favorite cocktail or mixed drink with a fun to watch mini tornado. These see through cocktail tornado mixers are an easy to use drink shaker that use AAA batteries to power the mini tornado inside.

Are you a deep thinker in the shower, coming up brilliant ideas but never being able to write them down? Now you can think up tons of great ideas in the shower and capture them with these waterproof notepads. Each pad includes forty waterproof blank slates.

Enjoy a game of Russian Roulette with the whole family where nobody has to die – this water balloon version of the deadly roulette game plays with similar rules, only the loser walks away with completely soaked clothing and not a bullet in the head.

Show off your passion for America and useless sunglasses with these bold United States of America shaped sunglasses. These one of a kind glasses feature every state in America minus Hawaii or Alaska. If you don’t buy these sunglasses, the terrorists win.

Transport your data with those clever little skateboard USB drives. Available in a huge variety of skateboard designs from Zoo York to Birdhouse, these USB drives hold up to four gigabytes of data and a cool gift idea for the geeky skater.

Keep your smart phone, GPS, or any gadget imaginable stuck to your dashboard with this vertical gripping dashboard pad. Perfect for watching movies, displaying GPS information, or just making sure your stuff doesn’t go flying when you make a sharp turn on the road.

Have some real cannon warfare with your office mates with these fully functional tiny cannons. Firing deadly tiny .177″ cannon balls, these mini cannons pack a surprisingly powerful punch – capable of obliterating beer bottles, wine glasses, and other small objects.

Dry yourself off after a warm shower and look like a practitioner of the dark side of the force with these Star Wars Sith bathrobes. Made entirely from high quality cotton, these bath robes also double as a Star Wars Halloween costume.

Modern man has evolved significantly over the past few decades – he’s more in touch with his feelings, he cares about how he dresses, but how can he scratch his balls without looking like a pig? Nine out of ten gentlemen agree, the gentleman’s ball scratcher is the clear solution.

A glorious new age is upon us – no longer must you struggle to squeeze the juice out of your citrus fruits with those weak little hands of yours – now you can effortlessly suck and spray the life out of a fruit with these fruit juice sprayers.

Create home made mini ice cream sandwiches with this cute ice cream maker that uses no batteries; simply gather your favorite store bought ingredients and add a dash of gluttony and you’ll be making your own custom mini ice cream sandwiches in no time!

Cruise around town with these lightweight and flexible longboards that are infused with LEDs that will make this light up skateboard turn heads wherever you go. Perfect for skating at night, these light up skateboards are available in blue, green, and red LED versions.

For the first time in the history of man, you can actually give a flying fuck! While not exactly the most precise of helicopters, the remote control flying fuck is perfect for those special moments when a verbally spoken curse word just won’t suffice.

Basketball fans and alcoholics rejoice – now you can combine your two favorite hobbies with this basketball beer pong game! Played just like traditional beer pong, except game table is now a portable basketball backboard, and the goal is to hit jumpshots.

Turn your backyard into a dinosaur museum with these life size T-Rex and other various dinosaur sculptures! Standing over twelve feet tall, this realistic T-Rex sculpture is the next best thing to having a private island, a team of scientists, and a prehistoric frozen mosquito.

Always forgetting where you last left you keys? Now you can stay organized by holding your keys on these surprisingly strong magnetic light switch covers. These magnetic covers include three strong magnets at the bottom, and are perfect home accessory for the absent minded.

Bake some bite sized crime fighters with these mini cake molds! Included in these geeky set of non-stick finish super hero cake molds are Captain America, Iron Man, Thor, Spider Man, Wolverine, and the Hulk – perfect for baking some cool munchies for a kid’s birthday party.

The Future™ delivers once more with another excellent product – the transparent glass toaster! No longer must you tweak your heat and timer settings, now you can just turn on the toaster and literally watch it heat up to a perfect golden brown toast.

Show off your ever growing family with these shambling zombie family car stickers. Put them on your minivan and display your love for zombies and wholesale family things – or infect random vehicles with these stickers and proclaim them to be apart of your zombie army!

Let everyone know what a hardcore thug you are without the life long commitment of a real tattoo with these full size Thug Life temporary tattoos. Included in this pack are four thuggish temporary tattoos, enough for you and your crew of true to the street homies.

Looking for a pocket mirror that shows your blatant obsession with Apple products? No bigger than an iPod Nano, these pocket mirrors are styled like a miniature MacBook Air – except the monitor has been replaced with a high quality reflective mirror.

Now you can have the doors in your own home automatically slide open just like they do in retail stores with this automatic sliding door system. This DIY kit includes everything you need to upgrade your doors automatic sliders, giving your home a modern feel.

For once ThisIsWhyImBroke saves you money – the shaving blade sharpener is designed to keep those expensive shaving razors sharp so you aren’t breaking the bank just to have a smooth and clean shave. With all that saved cash, you can buy more junk from us!

Organize your desk without cluttering it with storage shelves with these flip up keyboards that have a hidden storage compartment for pens, highlighters, business cards, papers, and any other typical office supplies you’ve got lying around on your desk.

Easily carry eight feet of paracord rope on your wrist with these paracord survival bracelets. Essential for outdoors adventuring, these paracord rope bracelets will stretch out to eight feet in length and are an essential tool in emergency survival scenarios.

Sleep in comfort while disturbing any curious onlookers with these blood pool pillows that make you look like you’re lying in a pool of your own blood. Made from soft velvet, these bloody pool pillows are perfect for those late cram sessions at a crowded library.

You love Han Solo, he knows – and now you can add to your collection of Star Wars gear with this Han Solo frozen in carbonite iPhone case. These flexible silicone Han Solo cases are available in both black and white colors, and are a must have for Star Wars fans.

Improve your dog’s cognitive skills and self reliance with this doggie pedal water fountain. All your dog has to dog is step on the pedal to open the water fountain valve – just remember to train your dog to only use it when he’s thirsty.

You might not know it, but cats are natural DJs. Now you can let Mr. Fluffums practice his wicked DJ skills while also keeping his nails sharp with these cat scratch posts shaped like turntables that will actually spin when your cat puts his claws into it.

Everyone loves lightsabers, and now you can light up your bedroom ironically with the power of the dark side! These wall mounting double sided Darth Maul lightsaber lamps are a perfect accessory to a kid’s room, or for a geeky game room.

Easily turn your faucet into a water fountain in seconds with these clever tap squeeze devices. Now you can easily rinse out your mouth after brushing your teeth, just squeeze the device at the bottom and instantly the water will get redirected upward like a fountain.

In these uncertain times you can’t afford to not have the best in your armored mobile tech. The JL421 Badonkadonk is the most sophisticated land cruiser tank a private civilian can buy – and at a low price of just $20K you’d be stupid not to buy it!

Set the mood with these trendy outdoor light up cubes. The perfect accessory for a modern backyard or patio, these rechargeable LED cubes are waterproof, hold up to three hundred pounds, and even come with a wireless remote control.

Chill your drinks without using ice cubes – these whiskey stone shot glasses will chill your liquor and keep it cold for hours. Made from natural soapstone, these whiskey stone shot glasses are an excellent gift for drinkers who want cold but not watered down drinks.

Prepare to hit your taste buds at light speed with these Millennium Falcon chocolate molds. These geeky Star Wars themed silicone molds can be also be used to create Millennium Falcon shaped ice cubes, and will be a big hit at any geeky party.

Keep your hands warm and toasty while retaining your god given right to text people using your phone. These touch screen gloves have a special material used on the tips of the fingers and thumb areas, allowing your phone to respond to your finger input.

Steampunk meets real world usability with this telescope ring that includes a built in compass, magnifying glass, and of course a small folding compass. Made from cast metal and available in multiple ring sizes, this telescope ring is a practical yet stylish steampunk accessory.

There is no easy way to clean a typical re-usable water bottle – until now – the easy clean water bottle has a detachable lid at both the bottom and top, giving you easy access to clean off the build up of bacteria you normally wouldn’t be able to reach in a water bottle.

When the iconic green army toy soldiers aren’t saving the world from the bad guys, they’re off doing wicked skateboard tricks. These plastic army men skaterboarders look just like the classic army men toys except their weapons have been replaced with skateboards.

Teach your kids how to draw in between the lines and also avoid being a mark ass bitch with these gangsta rap coloring books. Fun for the whole family, these coloring books feature 48 pages of music icons from the gangsta rap genre such as Biggie, Eazy E, and many others.

Play laser tag with all your friends with this smartphone laser tag attachment and app! Available for both Android and iPhones, this laser tag app and gun not only makes laser tag games instantaneous, but it also has cool features like armor, ammo, and health packs.

Chivalry might be dead, but that doesn’t mean you can’t still dress like a knight in modern times with these armored knight hoodies. Featuring a retractable helmet and reinforced stitching, your armored knight hoodie is sure to last through many joustings.

Instantly know the temperature of the water coming out of your faucet with this LED faucet nozzle attachment. Cold water turns the LED blue and hot water turns the LED red – making it perfect for avoiding third degree burns from faucets that spew hot lava.

If you ever want to get out of the hood you’re going to need a sick jumpshot. Now you can practice shooting jumpshots with this practice basketball returner mechanism. Whenever you make a jumpshot, you are rewarded with the ball being effortlessly returned to you.

Enjoy a warm fire at home without needing a built in fireplace. These modern wall mounted fireplaces will add character to any home and require no logs to keep the fire going, instead they use a safe and clean burning liquid ethanol as a fuel source.

Listen to your favorite songs with these ear buds that will likely be the only time you’ll enjoy having a pair of nine millimeter bullets angled in the direction of your skull. Available in gold, silver, and black bullet colors, these ear buds are a must have item for gun enthusiasts.

Whether on land or sea, a true party should never be without a beer pong table. For those aquatic themed parties at the pool, lake, or beach, this full size vinyl inflatable beer pong table will allow you to keep the drinking games going in full effect.

Relax at the beach without carrying around a bulky lounger chair with these inflatable back pillows. Perfect for the outdoors where seating just isn’t up to par such as picnics or at the beach, these inflatable pillows can be arranged in multiple positions for optimum comfort.

Land some electrically charged blows to any potential attacker with these brass knuckles tazers. These knuckle enhancing stun guns pack an impressive 950,000 volts of electricity in every punch, enough to paralyze your attacker even if you punch like a little girl.

Aside from opening beer bottles with your eye socket, this switch blade bottle opener will be the coolest way you’ll ever crack open some cold ones. Just flick the switch like a regular switchblade knife, and you’ll be the envy of all your alcoholic buddies.

You’re sexy and you know it – but if you really want to show the whole world how beautifully in-shape you are, then you’re going to have to show off your inner beauty too. These exposed muscle leggings will give off the look of your legs being turned inside out.

Take pictures with your iPhone instanteously with the one click iPhone camera button. No longer will you have to fumble with the iPhone’s proprietary software as this clever attachment makes taking photos with your phone a snap, literally.

Watch time flip away with these modernized flip down clocks. Inspired by the retro clocks that had flip down hour and minute displays, these modern versions were designed with ‘outside the box’ thinking, ditching the container box and giving the clock an exposed form.

Watch <del>porn</del> movies or read books hands free on your iPad while you lie down on your bed with this hands free iPad stand. Able to be mounted anywhere, this 360 degree swiveling iPad stand has endless applications such as displaying recipes will you cook dinner.

There is no better gift to turn on that special geeky lady in your life than a light up necklace designed after the universal computer power button. This necklace is open source too, so you can get in and tinker with the LED flashing speed.

Keep your hands and your beer insulated with these beer koozie mittens. The perfect gift for cold winter drinking parties, these sheep wool mittens give your hands the perfect shape to hold a beer bottle like any real caring beer drinker should.

Chill your favorite drink with an eye catching and perfectly seamless sphere ice mold. This food grade silicone mold will create a beautiful ball of ice quickly and easily – so you can enjoy your drink without it getting watered down.

No vehicle is more fit for the title of Hawttt Hot Wheels than the Ecto-1 Ghostbuster mobile. This extremely detailed 1:18 scale die-cast replica is a must have item for Ghostbusters fans, vintage Cadillac lovers, and unusual movie prop collectors.

Show off your elite hunting skills with this T-Rex trophy wall mountable sculpture. Not only will guests of your home think you are a deadly hunter, but they’ll also be impressed that you were invited to visit the exclusive Jurassic Park island – and then killed anything that moved.

Before the recession hit, the purest form of wealth was exhibited by how much money you could wipe your ass with. But now in these tough economic times, how is one supposed to keep up this expensive habit? The answer is these novelty money toilet paper rolls.

Wash your hands in the most disgusting way possible – with poop! These poop soap bars are a hilarious yet fully functional novelty item that will disturb guests in your home. And just like real poop, these bars of soap vary in shape, size, and corn consistency!

Stay on point and sharpen your way to honesty with the Pinocchio pencil sharpener. The more you sharpen your pencils, the more honest the little wooden boy becomes with a shorter nose. This functional piece of childhood nostalgia is a great addition to any home office or work desk.

Your dog valiantly defends your home, but if given the chance he would jump at the opportunity to fight crime in the streets! Now you can dress your dog up like the super hero he wishes to be with these super hero dog costumes – available in many different styles.

Now you can play with the focal instrument from arguably the greatest game ever made – Zelda: The Ocarina of Time. This ceramic twelve hole musical ocarina instrument looks and plays just like it did in the Zelda video game, and comes with a book of songs too.

Walk your dog at night safely and stylishly with these light up dog leashes. With countless design styles, you will be visible to oncoming traffic in a variety of light colors that you can select to either emit a flashing or steady glow onto the dog leash.

Have you ever wondered what the Statue of David would look like if it were sculpted recently using what the average sized man looks like today as inspiration? This obese Statue of David sculpture embodies the gluttony, and the abundance of obesity in modern times.

Tired of those weak regular laser pointers that don’t paralyze and cause permanent retina damage to someone when you point it at their eyes? Want to own a laser so powerful that it’s practically a lightsaber? We present to you the world’s most powerful laser.

Light up your bedroom at night with Science™! Creating a beautiful show of pink and purple lightning, these plasma bulb night lights are mini versions of the classic plasma light toy that we all were enthralled with as children, and makes a great gift idea for any kid’s room.

It’s just a flesh wound! The black knight is the bravest knight in all the land, willing to fight til he is nothing more than a stump. This fourteen inch tall fully dismemberable black knight plush toy is a must have item for fans of the Monty Python movies.

If you loved playing with transformers as a kid, you’ll love this Transforming USB flash drive. Equipped with four gigs of memory and built to look like Ravage, the decepticon transforming jungle cat definitely has more than meets the eye.

Easily store your beer on your hip while your hands are busy barbequing, lifting weights, boxing, and doing other manly activities that tie up the use of both your hands. Or have stand offs with other beer slingers to see who has the quickest draw time.

These unique wine glasses feature a built in aerating fountain in the center that will disperse your wine out over several different aeration spouts, infusing oxygen into the wine to release more flavor. It also works great for top shelf liquors.

Upgrade the look of your fridge, microwave, or any one dimensional home device to look like an app filled <del>iPhone</del> smart phone with these smart phone app magnets. A cool novelty gift idea for geeks, this magnet package comes with eighteen eye catching app magnets.

Want to watch TV from the couch and eat at the same time? Want to use your laptop while sitting without heating your crotch to Mordor like levels? The lift out coffee table is here to help, with it’s spring assisted transformation mechanism to lift up and out with ease.

Remember how great the 1980s were? We don’t either! Now you can mockingly honor the decade known best for cocaine and bad fashion with this 80s style iPhone case that will turn your sleek iPhone into a bulky and cumbersome brick like device.

Scare the life out of your fellow arachnophobe friends with this remote control tarantula with light up spider eyes. This 1:1 scale R/C spider has a furry texture as well as independent leg movement to seem even more like it’s real life counter part.

Chill your drink while also reminding yourself that global warming is killing off polar bears as these arctic ice cube molds melts away. The molds are easy to make, just add water, freeze them, then watch them melt to nothing – just like their real life counter parts!

Keep your desk neat, tidy, and organized with these detailed zombie head desk organizers. Perfect for zombie lovers, these hand crafted urethane zombie heads cleverly allow storage of pencils, pens, letters, business cards, and even sticky notes.

This is the coffee mug you were looking for! This high detailed ceramic Storm Trooper’s Head Coffee Mug is a great collector’s item for any Star Wars fan, and goes great alongside the equally amazing Darth Vader and Boba Fett Coffee Mugs.

Greet your guests with bitter surprise with these out of the ordinary doormats. Durable and easy to maintain, these non-skid vinyl backed doormats are a great way to express your thoughts on the annoying neighbors and solicitors in your neighborhood.

Mother Nature’s original pillow has finally been redesigned. The Log Pillow is softer, friendlier, and has a better personality than your typical wooden log. While you can’t build a fire with it, the Log Pillow works great for camping trips, pillow fights, and even makes a great friend.

Drink from the skull of doom with this Crystal Skull Shot Glass. Able to hold up to 2.5 ounces of your favorite liquor in it’s unique inverted skull shape, you’ll look like such a cool guy as you look straight in the eyes and down your shots.
